name: BoreOut!
description:
Always wanted to say F**k It to your boss ? Now you can, in BoreOut! A relaxing game where you can get rid of your fellow and beloved coworkers. But careful of the fierce managers, whom assure that every employee is doing their part...

This was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47.

By Maxence "Az-steak" Deschamps, Paul "HOOLOP" Moulin and Kevin "130N35" Penin

Controls

WASD/ZQSD to move

Left-mouse to take an object

Right-mouse to throw an object

Control to crouch
